trustfund:
TF057139-PHRD: LAO PDR - FINANCIAL
            MANAGEMENT CAPACITY BUILDING CREDIT

abstracts.cdata!:
The additional grant for Lao financial
            management capacity building project will finance activities
            for the implementation o f the new organic Budget Law in the
            following areas: developing a new intergovernmental fiscal
            framework; implementation of the revised Chart of Accounts
            and Budget Nomenclature; support to treasury centralization;
            and strengthening external audit capacity. These
            subcomponents will be fully integrated into the restructured
            project framework under the subcomponent supporting the
            Public Expenditure Management Strengthening Program (PEMSP).
